label: ball
caption: As the black and white dog bursts into the sparkling pool, its joyful yelp fills the air as it effortlessly glides across the water with a worn rubber ball clutched tightly in its jaws. The ball, which has been retrieved from a previous game of fetch on the sun-drenched lawn, is now floating alongside its owner's splashing form. A few carefree moments of aquatic play will soon give way to a refreshing afternoon nap under the warm sun.
